comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: According to NYT of April 19, 1907 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9902E4DD1738E033A... Miss May Appleton Tuckerman was married to G. Hermann Kinnicutt in NYC on April 18, 1907 in "one of the largest weddings of the season" www.usgennet.org/usa/topic/historical/southernnewyork/s_n... indicates that "g" was for Gustav

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of July 27, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9403EED8153FE633A... noted that a Mrs. Charles Mellen and her son and daughter were spending the summer at their "country place" at Morristown.
